faqSection.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faqSection.description: Find answers to common questions about our physiotherapy services.

q1.question: What conditions do you treat?
q1.answer: Our physiotherapists treat a wide range of conditions including back pain, neck pain, sports injuries, post-surgical rehabilitation, arthritis, and more. We offer both in-person and virtual consultations to address your specific needs.

q2.question: How long does a typical physiotherapy session last?
q2.answer: Initial consultations typically last 45-60 minutes, while follow-up sessions are usually 30-45 minutes. The exact duration may vary based on your specific condition and treatment requirements.

q3.question: Do I need a referral from a doctor?
q3.answer: No, you don't need a doctor's referral to book an appointment with our physiotherapists. However, some insurance providers may require a referral for coverage, so we recommend checking with your insurance company first.

q4.question: How many sessions will I need?
q4.answer: The number of sessions varies depending on your condition, its severity, and how your body responds to treatment. After your initial assessment, your physiotherapist will provide a recommended treatment plan with an estimated number of sessions.

q5.question: Do you accept insurance?
q5.answer: Yes, we accept most major insurance plans. We can provide you with the necessary documentation to submit to your insurance provider for reimbursement. We recommend verifying your coverage before your first appointment.

q6.question: What should I wear to my appointment?
q6.answer: Please wear comfortable, loose-fitting clothing that allows easy access to the area requiring treatment. For lower body issues, shorts are recommended, and for upper body concerns, a tank top or t-shirt is appropriate.

ctaSection.title: Start Your Recovery Journey Today
ctaSection.description: Take the first step towards better health and mobility. Our expert physiotherapists are ready to help you achieve your wellness goals.

contact.sendYourConcerns: Please send us your concerns preferably by email to:
contact.message: For the fastest response, we recommend contacting us via email. Our team typically responds within 24 business hours. For urgent matters, please call us directly during business hours.
